DOC.brief_summary: The aim study compare soft tissue reaction ( bleeding , gingival color texture ) , bacteria type count gingival sulcus around restoration margin sulcus depth Bio-compatible High performance polymer ( Bio-Hpp ) restorations E-max regardless popularity dental field .

DOC.detailed_description: Roles responsibility : 1 . Esra ' Mohamed Ali Mraweh ( E.M ) : Operator , data enterer correspond author ; Assistant lecturer , Fixed Prosthodontics Department , Modern Technology Information University ( MTI University ) , Egypt . 2 . Dr. Hesham Alansary ( H.A ) : Main supervisor , data monitoring , audit Professor , Fixed prosthodontics department , Faculty Oral Dental Medicine , Cairo University , Egypt . 3 . Nora Helmy ( N.H ) : Outcome assessor data collection ; Assistant Lecturers , Fixed Prosthodontics department , Faculty Oral Dental Medicine , Modern Technology Information University ( MTI university ) , Egypt . 4 . Noha Moustafa ( N.M ) : Base line data collection , recruitment , sequence generation , allocation concealment , patient retention take participant ' consent ; Resident , Fixed Prosthodontics Department , Faculty Oral Dental Medicine , Modern Technology Information University ( MTI University ) , Egypt . 5 . Eman Desouky ( E.D . ) : Sample size calculation ; Statistician , Faculty Oral Dental Medicine , Cairo University , Egypt . 6 . Evidence Based Dentistry Committee ( CEBD ) : Help reporting study protocol follow SPIRIT guideline ; Faculty Oral Dental Medicine , Cairo University , Egypt . 7 . Research Ethics Committee ( CREC ) : Protocol reviewer clinical trial order protect right , safety , dignity well-being participant . Faculty Oral Dental Medicine , Cairo University , Egypt . 8 . Research Plan Committee ( CRPC ) : For ensure clinical trial follow department research plan ; Fixed Prosthodontic Department , Faculty Oral Dental Medicine , Cairo University , Egypt . 1 . Intervention : E.M. record crevice depth bacterial count prior preparation . E.M. perform full coverage conservative tooth preparation follow principle ceramic crown preparation shoulder sub-gingival finish line thickness 1mm use taper stone flat end attach high speed headpiece air water coolant local anesthesia give required.After tooth preparation , E.M take adequate 2ry Impression use non aqueous Elastomeric impression material Impregum™F ( medium consistency,3M ESPE ) bite registration , Pink Soft wax ( Star dental supply ) take . E.M fabricate temporary restoration use composite resin temporary material Protemp™4 Temporisation Material ( 3M ESPE ) cement use non Eugenol Zinc Oxide temporary cement TempBond™ Temporization ( Kerr Dental ) . E.M deliver press Bio-compatible High performance polymer ( Bio-HPP ) frame work veneer visio.lign system ( Bredent ) cement adhesive resin cement 3M™ ESPE™ RelyX™ Unicem Self-Adhesive Universal Resin Cement ( 3M ESPE ) accord manufacturer instruction . 2 . Comparator : E.M. record crevice depth bacterial count prior preparation . E.M. perform full coverage conservative tooth preparation follow principle ceramic crown preparation shoulder sub-gingival finish line thickness 1mm use taper stone flat end attach high speed headpiece air water coolant local anesthesia give required.After tooth preparation , E.M take adequate 2ry Impression use non aqueous Elastomeric impression material Impregum™F ( medium consistency,3M ESPE ) bite registration , Pink Soft wax ( Star dental supply ) take . E.M fabricate temporary restoration use composite resin temporary material Protemp™4 Temporisation Material ( 3M ESPE ) cement use non Eugenol Zinc Oxide temporary cement TempBond™ Temporization ( Kerr Dental ) . E.M. deliver Pres-sable E-max ( IPS e.max® ) framework veneer e-max veneering system ( Ivoclar Vivadent ) .The finish crown cemented adhesive resin cement 3M™ ESPE™ RelyX™ Unicem Self-Adhesive Universal Resin Cement ( 3M ESPE ) accord manufacturer instruction . 3 . Outcome : ( ) Patient satisfaction ( bio-compatibility ) N.H measure patient satisfaction use data questionnaire ( presence absence bleeding . ) The main standard deviation questionnaire patient time crown cementation , 3 , 6,9 12 month record . ( ii ) Clinical biological outcome : - N.H measure Crevice depth use periodontal probe record depth millimeter - N.H collect swap teeth Bacterial count measure use culture number cell per millimeter - The main standard deviation collect data , time crown cementation , 3 , 6,9 12 month record .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Age range patient 1850 year old , able read sign inform consent document . 2 . Patient able physically psychologically tolerate conventional restorative procedure . 3 . Patients active periodontal pulpal disease , pocket , bone defect resorption , teeth good restoration . 4 . Patients good Occlusion parafunctional habit 5 . Patient teeth problem indicate full coverage restoration ( e.g . mild moderate dislocation , coronal fracture partial coverage would lack retention , malposed malformed teeth ) . 6 . Patients willing return followup examination evaluation . 7 . Patient sound contralateral tooth select tooth require full coverage . 8 . Patient root canal treat tooth require full coverage restoration 1 . Patient growth stage partially erupt teeth . 2 . Patient poor oral hygiene motivation . 3 . Patients periodontal disease , bony defect . 4 . Pregnant woman ` . 5 . Patient psychiatric problem unrealistic expectation . 6 . Patients oppose occlude dentition area intend restoration . 7 . Patients Mal Occlusion Parafunctional habit .
